entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -0.8°C
entry.summary:

Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 75 %

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Flurries at times heavy beginning this evening and ending late this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 early this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
